sections.heading: Counterclaim; injunction upon.A defendant may obtain an injunction upon an answer in the nature of a counterclaim
sections.text: He shall proceed in the manner prescribed in sections 25-1062 to 25-1080.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 265, p. 437;R.S.1913, § 7806;C.S.1922, § 8750;C.S.1929, § 20-1077;R.S.1943, § 25-1077.
